node_2: hitesh kewalya, aanand l. rai, bhushan kumar, himanshu sharma
edge: The movie has been nominated for the Best Asian Film award at the AACTA Awards by producers Hitesh Kewalya, Aanand L. Rai, Bhushan Kumar, and Himanshu Sharma.
Ayushmann Khurrana has been nominated for the Best Actor award at the Filmfare Awards.
Gajraj Rao has been nominated for the Best Supporting Actor award at the Filmfare Awards.
Maanvi Gagroo has been nominated for the Best Supporting Actress award at the Filmfare Awards.
Neena Gupta has been nominated for the Best Supporting Actress award at the Filmfare Awards.
The song "Mere Liye Tum Kaafi Ho" has been nominated for the Best Lyricist award at the Filmfare Awards, written by Vayu Shrivastav.
Ayushmann Khurrana has been nominated for the Best Male Playback Singer award at the Filmfare Awards, for singing "Mere Liye Tum Kaafi Ho".
